channel.title: Section 69 on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Section 69 on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: CIC admonishes the MHA and seeks confirmation on affidavit of destruction of surveillance data
item.description: IFF had filed six RTIs with the MHA seeking data on the e-surveillance. MHA first denied information on grounds of national security and later claimed that the data did not exist. CIC has admonished the CPIO for changing its stance and sought confirmation on non-availability of data on affidavit.
